name: gunncs_navigation
body:
## What is gunncs_navigation?
A [ROS](http://www.willowgarage.com/pages/software/ros-platform) package for the [iARoC](http://iaroc.org) competition. gunncs_navigation uses Microsoft Kinect sensor and iRobot Create, to navigate a PVC pipe maze. 

## What are you working on?

### April 29, 2012

Currently we are using the Microsoft Kinect's Depth camera to produce a fake laser scan. With the laser scan we are implementing simple feature detection, for highly continuous maze traveling.Our modded iRobot Create assembly is named **old-subdivision**. Old subdivision features rubber bumpers, a sonar array, Microsoft Kinect, and an expanded 1/8" smoked polycarbonate cargo bay. In the works is 12V regulation for the Kinect.


## Blog updates

[Starting ROS with perception](http://patienceandplanning.blogspot.com/2012/04/gunncs-iaroc-starting-with-ros-and.html)

[Hardware: old-subdivision](http://patienceandplanning.blogspot.com/2012/04/gunncs-iaroc-starting-with-ros-and.html)

_For more updates, see [the blog](http://patienceandplanning.blogspot.com/). directly_
tagline: gunncs's navigation code for the iaroc competition
